name: react-footgun
description: The `useFootGun()` hook is designed for testing purposes to simulate a scenario where an asynchronous task gradually increases in complexity, potentially impacting the performance of a React application. It is important to note that deliberately causing poor performance is not a standard practice and should be used cautiously for testing purposes only.

scripts.build: tsc index.js --allowJs true --checkJs true --outDir lib --declaration true

author: Adeniji Oluwaferanmi (TheLazyDev)
